alert.note: Alert for Southern Brevard County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 02 at 1:23AM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Brevard County through 200 AM EDT... At 123 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Indian Harbour Beach, or over Satellite Beach, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Palm Bay, Melbourne, Satellite Beach, Indialantic and West Melbourne. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or hard-topped vehicle. Remember, when thunder roars, go indoors!
